comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Eleanor Siebert helped to launch the USS Nevada in 1914; she was the niece of Governor Tasker Oddie of Nevada (so that's him next to her). The man on the left is Secretary of the Navy Josephus Daniels: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Josephus_Daniels en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tasker_Oddie

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC: Your caption misspells Eleanor's first name.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Is Secretary Daniels flipping a secret signal?

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: pennyrichardsca: Thanks so much for filling in the names, and the likely occasion for the photo.  We will fill in the names and correct the spelling, Wystan,  the next time we update the record.
